article.name: Grant Support Access to Your Account
article.title: Grant Support Access to Your Account
label_names: How to Create an Action in PhishER
article.body:
If you can’t find the information you need in our Knowledge Base or you need assistance, our support team is here to help. Before you contact our support team, we recommend that you grant our support team access to your account. Granting access to your account will allow our support team to respond to issues quickly and provide you with personalized assistance.

For general information about opening a support ticket, see our Learner Support: How to Contact Our Support Team article.

Check Your Privacy Settings

To see if our support team can access your account, you can check your privacy settings. To check your privacy settings, follow the steps below:

  1. Log in to your KSAT console.
  2. Click your email address at the top-right corner of the page and select Account Settings.
  3. Navigate to Account Information > Account Privacy.
  4. In the Account Privacy section, locate the blue banner that displays your account's current privacy status.

To learn more about each privacy status, see the table below:

Privacy Status Description
KnowBe4 agents can access your account. This privacy status allows our support team to access your account.
KnowBe4 agents can access your account until [Date/Time].

This privacy status allows our support team to access your account until a specific date or time.

If you need assistance but access to your account will expire within 24 hours, we recommend extending the time frame. To learn how to extend the time frame, see the Grant Access to Your Account section below.
KnowBe4 agents cannot access your account.

This privacy status does not allow our support team to access your account.

To learn how to grant our support team access to your account, see the Grant Access to Your Account section below.
Note:If a reseller partner manages your account, the Account Privacy setting also applies to your reseller partner's ability to access your account. For example, if you select the setting "KnowBe4 agents cannot access your account", then a reseller partner cannot access your account.

Grant Access to Your Account

Depending on your privacy settings, you may need to grant our support team access to your account.

To grant access to your account, follow the steps below:

  1. Log in to your KSAT console.
  2. Click your email address at the top-right corner of the page and select Account Settings.
  3. Navigate to Account Information > Account Privacy.
  4. Click the Allow KnowBe4 agents to access this account.drop-down menu.
  5. From the drop-down menu, select the length of time you would like to allow our support team to access your account.
    Tip: If you would like to skip these steps in the future, select Allow continual access. This option allows KnowBe4 agents to access your account any time you report a new issue.
  6. In the confirmation window that opens, click Confirm.

images.alt:
This image displays a segment of a user interface, likely a settings or configuration panel focused on security and access controls.

1.  **Page Title (H1/Heading):** The title of the section is clearly displayed as "**Account Privacy**".
2.  **System Notification Banner:** Below the title, a rectangular status banner is present. This element features a light cyan/blue background color and subtle rounded corners.
3.  **Banner Content (Text):** The notification text, centered within the banner, reads: "**KnowBe4 agents can access your account.**"

**Context:** The interface communicates an active state where administrative or support agents (from the entity "KnowBe4") have granted access or privileges to the user's account data.
